verses.verse: The <S%H9294>oracle<s%> concerning the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> As <S%H5492>windstorms<s%> in the <S%H5045>Negev<s%> <S%H2498>sweep<s%> on, It <S%H935>comes<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> from a <S%H3372>terrifying<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

A <S%H7186>harsh<s%> <S%H2380>vision<s%> has been <S%H5046>shown<s%> to me; The <S%H898>treacherous<s%> one still <S%H898>deals<s%> <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> [and] the <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> still <S%H7703>destroys.<s%> <S%H5927>Go<s%> up, <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> <S%H6696>lay<s%> <S%H6696>siege,<s%> <S%H4074>Media;<s%> I have <S%H7673>made<s%> an <S%H7673>end<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H603>groaning<s%> she has caused.

For <S%H3651>this<s%> <S%H5921>reason<s%> <S%H3651><s%> my <S%H4975>loins<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2479>anguish;<s%> <S%H9483>Pains<s%> have <S%H270>seized<s%> me like the <S%H9483>pains<s%> of a woman in <S%H3205>labor.<s%> I am <S%H4480>so<s%> <S%H9389>bewildered<s%> I <S%H4480>cannot<s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> <S%H4480>so<s%> <S%H926>terrified<s%> I <S%H4480>cannot<s%> <S%H7200>see.<s%>

My <S%H3824>mind<s%> <S%H8582>reels,<s%> <S%H6427>horror<s%> <S%H1204>overwhelms<s%> me; The <S%H5399>twilight<s%> I <S%H2837>longed<s%> for has been <S%H7760>turned<s%> for me into <S%H2731>trembling.<s%>

They <S%H6186>set<s%> the <S%H7979>table,<s%> they <S%H6823>spread<s%> out the <S%H6844>cloth,<s%> they <S%H398>eat,<s%> they <S%H8354>drink;<s%> <S%H6965>"Rise<s%> up, <S%H8269>captains,<s%> <S%H4886>oil<s%> the <S%H4043>shields,<s%>"
For <S%H3541>thus<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> to me, <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H5975>station<s%> the <S%H6822>lookout,<s%> let him <S%H5046>report<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H7200>sees.<s%>

"When he <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H7393>riders,<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> in <S%H6776>pairs,<s%> A <S%H7393>train<s%> of <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> a <S%H7393>train<s%> of <S%H1581>camels,<s%> Let him <S%H7181>pay<s%> <S%H7182>close<s%> <S%H7181>attention,<s%> <S%H7227>very<s%> <S%H7182>close<s%> <S%H7182>attention.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4707>lookout<s%> <S%H7121>called,<s%> "O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> I <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> on the watchtower, And I am <S%H5324>stationed<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> at my <S%H4931>guard<s%> <S%H4931>post.<s%>

"Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> a <S%H376>troop<s%> of <S%H7393>riders,<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> in <S%H6776>pairs.<s%>" And one <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5307>"Fallen,<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> is <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6456>images<s%> of her <S%H430>gods<s%> are <S%H7665>shattered<s%> on the <S%H776>ground.<s%>"

O my <S%H4098>threshed<s%> [people,] and my <S%H1121>afflicted<s%> of the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor!<s%> <S%H834>What<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I <S%H5046>make<s%> <S%H5046>known<s%> to you.

The <S%H9294>oracle<s%> concerning <S%H9000>Edom.<s%> One keeps <S%H7121>calling<s%> to me from <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> <S%H8104>"Watchman,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> far <S%H4480>gone<s%> is the <S%H3915>night<s%>? <S%H8104>Watchman,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> far <S%H4480>gone<s%> is the <S%H3915>night<s%>?"

The <S%H9294>oracle<s%> about <S%H9433>Arabia.<s%> In the <S%H9194>thickets<s%> of <S%H9433>Arabia<s%> you must <S%H3885>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night,<s%> O <S%H736>caravans<s%> of <S%H1720>Dedanites.<s%>

<S%H857>Bring<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H6771>thirsty,<s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8485>Tema,<s%> <S%H6923>Meet<s%> the <S%H5074>fugitive<s%> with <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

For they have <S%H5074>fled<s%> from the <S%H2719>swords,<s%> From the <S%H5203>drawn<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and from the <S%H1869>bent<s%> <S%H7198>bow,<s%> And from the <S%H3514>press<s%> of <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "In a <S%H8141>year,<s%> as a <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>man<s%> would <S%H8141>count<s%> it, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9202>splendor<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> will <S%H3615>terminate;<s%>

and the <S%H7605>remainder<s%> of the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H7198>bowmen,<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> will be <S%H4591>few;<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>"
